MinimumDrivingAgeAdditionalDetails: You can drive a car at 15 with parental surpervision and at 16 with parental consent, otherwise 18 is the minimum age
A full driving license will only be issued from 18 years old, however a learners license can be applied for at 17
Varies by province, as young as 14 in Alberta
Learners permit from 17 - women allowed to drive in Saudi Arabia from 2018
Learner driver min age set by state, ACT min driving age 15 years 9 months
Learners permit available from 16.5 years old
